name: real-estate-scripts
description: Utility scripts for Real Estate Dashboard - Database initialization and live updates simulation

scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = '../backend/database.sqlite'; if (fs.existsSync(path)) { fs.unlinkSync(path); console.log('✅ Database cleaned'); } else { console.log('⚠️  No database found'); }"

author: Real Estate Dashboard Team
